data.title: FLYER Forums
data.text:
Members only forum

An en exclusive and private area for members to discuss their flying, ask questions and socialise.

93 Topics

434 Posts by Genghis the Engineer

Wed Aug 28, 2024 1:02 pm Political Discussions

A new trial forum for political discussions. Largely unmoderated, so whilst discussing politics is fine, personal abuse isn't. So please keep it civil.

As with other forums the posts to do not reflect the view of the FLYER team.
